description:
Refresh finds common ground with the people you meet. It searches the web and social networks to deliver insights about your contacts: mutual interests, shared passions, and important moments. Refresh lays the foundation for better relationships and prepares you to connect in every meeting on your calendar. It’s all the research you need to prepare but don’t have time to do. 

**Featured by Apple as 'Best New App' in Productivity, Business and Social Networking!**

Seen in:
- Wall Street Journal
- Fortune
- Fast Company
- TechCrunch and more!

Features:
- Insights: Refresh finds the most important information on the web (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, email) to provide context.
- Calendar: Learn about the people on your calendar before you step into the meeting. Refresh syncs with your calendar and contacts to automatically send insights.
- Smart notifications: It’s hard to remember to prepare for meetings. Refresh notifies you just a few minutes before and reminds you to browse your insights.
- Contact history: Refresh integrates with your email and calendar to keep track of your interactions. For every contact you’ll see your first email, last meeting, and next meeting. 
- People Search: Want information on someone that you’re not scheduled to meet? No problem, search for anyone by name.
- Privacy: Refresh will never share your data. We take privacy seriously and will always respect your privacy settings across the web.

Questions or comments? Email us at support@refresh.io. We would love to hear from you.

Follow us at @RefreshApp or Like us at https://www.facebook.com/refreshapp.
trackCensoredName: Refresh - Insight on People You Meet

releaseNotes:
- Full support for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
- iOS8 Optimized
- Today Extension - Access insights for your meetings right from the Notification screen!
- New single card dossier design and faster loading
- iPad compatible
